file_content.text: [The monitoring station lies idle.]
I detect no more machines or monsters in the area. The safe zone is secure. Deploying more battle droids.
I will report your success to my Imperial Makers. Personally, I am glad you survived.
I am still detecting anomalies in the safe-zone location. Kill the monsters and destroy the machines that are mutating them.
[You activate the monitoring station terminal and set it to the Imperial frequency.]
Hmm. I recall you helped me reactivate the Rakata communications system. I thank you.
Though I remain connected to the Rakata brain, the Empire has developed new programming for me to interact with Rakata technology without threat to my sanity.
I regret that I must again ask for your assistance. And this mission will not be as easy as the first.
Hello. I am AR-72. It's fortunate that you've used this monitoring station.
The Empire requires your assistance for a mission that, I am required to inform you, may result in your death.
I'm intrigued.
Maybe not, then.
I hope you will at least listen before you judge.
I like them difficult.
Imperial battle droids were tasked with establishing a safe zone within the maximum security area of the prison, but were destroyed by mutated monstrosities before they could succeed.
Machines in the area are emitting radiation that strengthens these monsters. We need the monsters killed and the machines destroyed to establish the safe zone.
The safe zone is essential to learning the secrets of the Rakata prison and its prisoners.
I'll take care of it.
We'll see.
Do not delay too long. Maximum security is extremely dangerous.
I will try to use the prison's network to make reaching the beasts and destroying the devices easier. It will give you a zero point zero five percent chance of survival.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Regrettable. Perhaps I can find other means....
[This monitoring station appears to be deactivated.]
[You activate the monitoring station terminal and set it to the Imperial frequency.]
